description: Mitochondrial DNA sequencing is available on both Illumina’s MiSeq, and PacBio Sequel System. Illumina next-generation sequencing (NGS) has the potential to transform mtDNA analysis. Take advantage of PacBio’s long reads, CD Genomics present amplification-free, full-length sequencing of linearized mtDNA. Full-length sequencing allows variant phasing along the entire mitochondrial genome, identification of heteroplasmic variants, and detection of epigenetic modifications that are lost in amplicon-based methods.
name: Mitochondrial DNA (mtDNA) sequencing
